package zeta.util

  • public abstract class AnnotatedTerm (pure interface)
    The abstract class AnnotatedTerm is the superclass of any term of which carries an annotation
  • public class Annotation (pure interface)
    An annotation is a mutable collection of attributes which may be attached to terms
  • public abstract class DebugWriter (pure interface)
    A class for managing debug prints
  • public abstract class Impure (pure interface)
    This class provides system depend functionality, not supported by "100% pure Java". This
  • public class Name (pure interface)
    A Name is a wrapper around an interned String, with special methods for handling Z style
  • public final class Slot (pure interface)
    A Slot defines an entry for storing objects in an annotation
  • public abstract class Term (pure interface)
    The abstract class Term serves as a superclass of classes realizing "tree"-like data
  • public abstract class VerboseWriter (pure interface)
    A class for managing verbosity prints

  • public class FatalError (pure interface)
    A class for representing fatal errors, such as programming assertion failure.
